long: the, the definite article.
in, on, among.
and, even, also, namely.
I, the first-person pronoun.
anointed; the Messiah, the Christ.
who, which, what, that.

brief: all, the whole, every kind of
long: all, the whole, every kind of.
you.

brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

brief: down from, against, according to, throughout, during
long: gen: against, down from, throughout, by; acc: over against, among, daily, day-by-day, each day, according to, by way of.
(a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.
(a) God, (b) a god, generally.

brief: an age, a cycle of time
long: an age, a cycle (of time), especially of the present age as contrasted with the future age, and of one of a series of ages stretching to infinity.
into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.
Jesus; the Greek form of Joshua; Jesus, son of Eliezer; Jesus, surnamed Justus.
in order that, so that.
I offer, give; I put, place.
this; he, she, it.
I make known, declare, know, discover.
(a) physical power, force, might, ability, efficacy, energy, meaning (b) plur: powerful deeds, deeds showing (physical) power, marvelous works.

a mystery, secret, of which initiation is necessary; in the NT: the counsels of God, once hidden but now revealed in the Gospel or some fact thereof; the Christian revelation generally; particular truths or details of the Christian revelation.
honor, renown; glory, an especially divine quality, the unspoken manifestation of God, splendor.
(a) grace, as a gift or blessing brought to man by Jesus Christ, (b) favor, (c) gratitude, thanks, (d) a favor, kindness.
a race, people, nation; the nations, heathen world, Gentiles.
gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred.
(a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can.

brief: a man, one of the human race
long: a man, one of the human race.
a generation; if repeated twice or with another time word, practically indicates infinity of time.

brief: from out, out from among, from
long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.
wind, breath, spirit.
I am, exist.
I understand, think, consider, conceive, apprehend; aor. possibly: realize.
adv. (a) of time: just now, even now; just at hand, immediately, (b) of logical connection: now then, (c) in commands and appeals: at this instant.
love, benevolence, good will, esteem; plur: love-feasts.
to, towards, with.
riches, wealth, abundance, materially or spiritually.
who, which, what, why.
I ask, request, petition, demand.
management of household affairs, stewardship, administration.
faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
for the sake of, by reason of, on account of.
an assembly, congregation, church; the Church, the whole body of Christian believers.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.
the knee.
lord, master, sir; the Lord.
freedom, openness, especially in speech; boldness, confidence.
a setting forth, the show-bread; predetermination, purpose.
wisdom, insight, skill (human or divine), intelligence.
much varied, manifold.
approach, access, admission.
heavenly, celestial, in the heavenly sphere, the sphere of spiritual activities; met: divine, spiritual.
(a) power, authority, weight, especially: moral authority, influence, (b) in a quasi-personal sense, derived from later Judaism, of a spiritual power, and hence of an earthly power.
(a) rule (kingly or magisterial), (b) plur: in a quasi-personal sense, almost: rulers, magistrates, (c) beginning.
confidence, trust, reliance.
I create, form, shape, make, always of God.
wherefore, on which account, therefore.
from, away from.
I hide away, conceal, keep secret.
not, lest.
(a) I light up, illumine, (b) I bring to light, make evident, reveal.
I am faint, am weary.
that cannot be explored, incomprehensible.

brief: I bring good news, preach good tidings
long: I bring good news, preach good tidings, with or without an object, expressing either the persons who receive the good news or the good news itself (the good news being sometimes expressed as a person).
persecution, affliction, distress, tribulation.
the smallest, least important.
whosoever, whichsoever, whatsoever.
working, action, productive work, activity; in the NT, confined to superhuman activity.
a (free) gift, a gift (without repayment).
a waiter, servant; then of any one who performs any service, an administrator.

brief: I come into being, am born
long: I come into being, am born, become, come about, happen.
the good news of the coming of the Messiah, the gospel; the gen. after it expresses sometimes the giver (God), sometimes the subject (the Messiah, etc.), sometimes the human transmitter (an apostle).
I bend, bow.
a promise.
jointly partaking.
belonging to the same body; fig: of Jews and Gentiles belonging to the same Church.
a joint heir, participant.
I have, hold, possess.
father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior.
a prophet, poet; a person gifted at expositing divine truth.
lineage, ancestry; a family, tribe.
heaven, (a) the visible heavens: the atmosphere, the sky, the starry heavens, (b) the spiritual heavens.

brief: an apostle, a messenger, an envoy, a delegate
long: a messenger, envoy, delegate, one commissioned by another to represent him in some way, especially a man sent out by Jesus Christ Himself to preach the Gospel; an apostle.

brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.

brief: I uncover, bring to light, reveal
long: I uncover, bring to light, reveal.
the earth, soil, land, region, country, inhabitants of a region.

brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.

brief: I give a name to, mention
long: I give a name to, mention, call upon the name of.
a son, descendent.
no, not.
I strengthen, confirm; pass: I grow strong, become strong.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor.
a putting together in the mind, hence: understanding, practical discernment, intellect.
within, inside, with verbs either of rest or of motion; prep: within, to within, inside.
I read, know again, know certainly, recognize, discern.

brief: I dwell in, settle in, inhabit
long: I dwell in, settle in, am established in (permanently), inhabit.
lit: the heart; mind, character, inner self, will, intention, center.

brief: I root, fix by the root
long: I cause to take root; met: I plant, fix firmly, establish.
(a) especially in plur: few, (b) in sing: small; hence, of time: short, of degree: light, slight, little.
I found, lay the foundation (lit. and met.).
(a) I write previously (aforetime); I write above (already), (b) I depict or portray openly, (c) I designate beforehand.
according to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as.

brief: I have strength for, am perfectly able
long: I have strength for (a difficult task), am perfectly able.

brief: I seize tight hold of, overtake, comprehend
long: (a) I seize tight hold of, arrest, catch, capture, appropriate, (b) I overtake, (c) mid. aor: I perceived, comprehended.
an unveiling, uncovering, revealing, revelation.
with.
that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
breadth.
length.
height, heaven; dignity, eminence.
depth; deep water; met: fullness, immensity; an extreme degree; profundities, deep-laid plans.

brief: I come to know, learn, realize
long: I am taking in knowledge, come to know, learn; aor: I ascertained, realized.
I hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported.
an enclitic, emphasizing particle: at least, indeed, really, but generally too subtle to be represented in English.
if.
and, both.
I surpass, excel, exceed, transcend.
knowledge, doctrine, wisdom.
I fill, fulfill, complete.
(a) a fill, fullness; full complement; supply, patch, supplement, (b) fullness, filling, fulfillment, completion.
one bound, a prisoner.

brief: but, on the other hand, and
long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
Paul, Paulus.
or, than.
I work, am operative, am at work, am made to work, accomplish; mid: I work, display activity.

brief: verily, truly, amen, so let it be
long: verily, truly, amen; at the end of sentences may be paraphrased by: So let it be.
